name: Awakening (itch) (ProxyNode1)
description:
You fell into a cave and found yourself in the midst of a temple and gold worth a lifetime. But life is seldom this grateful, especially not in the darkest corners of the earth.

This is a level design blockout made entirely in Unreal Engine 4 for Steve Lee's community Level Design Jam #2. The themes of the jam were Verticality and Non-Violence. This level is made in unreal engine and uses the player controller and blueprint and C++ scripts made by me. It still has issue and is a WIP.

-----------------Controls--------------------------

W, A, S, D: Move Forward, Left, Right, Backwards, Respectively.

Mouse to Look. Not Inverted.

Space Bar: Jump

Right Ctrl: Crouch

F/E/Right Mouse Click: Interact / Pick Up Objects

Left Mouse Click: Throw Held Object

Middle Mouse Click/Z: Zoom Camera
